# 软件工程师软技能之语法俱乐部

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu
ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu
ruanjian-gongchengshi-ruan-jineng-zhi-yufa-julebu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
